name: SecretRegistry
description: SecretRegistry. SecretRegistry contract for registering secrets from Raiden Network clients.

functionDecorators.name: getSecretRevealBlockHeight
functionDecorators.description: Get the stored block number at which the secret was revealed.

parameterDecorators.name: secrethash
parameterDecorators.description: The hash of the registered secret `keccak256(secret)`.

returnDecorators.description: The block number at which the secret was revealed.

functionDecorators.name: registerSecret
functionDecorators.description: Registers a hash time lock secret and saves the block number. This allows the lock to be unlocked after the expiration block.

parameterDecorators.name: secret
parameterDecorators.description: The secret used to lock the hash time lock.

returnDecorators.description: true if secret was registered, false if the secret was already registered.

functionDecorators.name: registerSecretBatch
functionDecorators.description: Registers multiple hash time lock secrets and saves the block number.

parameterDecorators.name: secrets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of secrets to be registered.

returnDecorators.description: true if all secrets could be registered, false otherwise.
